name: Tenrr
tag_list: fiverr, micro-gig, micro-job, micro-gigs, micro-jobs, freelancers, sellers, buyers, services, jobs, website-owners, small-business-owners
overview:
Tenrr is a micro job marketplace where buyers and sellers of services meet; sellers post jobs that cost up to $10 while buyers get necessary services completed efficiently and inexpensively.

Tenrr is one of the very few and largest completely free micro job websites wherein the site doesn’t take commissions from the sellers after a successful sale. Another feature that’s unique to Tenrr in this niche is open communication is allowed and encouraged in necessary; meaning if members wish to provide contact details to each other or if they’d rather make a deal outside the frameworks of the site, that is acceptable.

Typically, the buyers are either internet marketers or website owners, but there are enough jobs on the site that appeal to everyday people from all walks of life. While the sellers are either supplementing their income or making full time work in the micro job freelancing world, website and small business owners are saving time and money purchasing essential, specialized services at Tenrr.
